runners.no_rights: Looks like you do not have enough rights to access the runners Gitlab API.

api_configuration.title: GitLab API Configuration
api_configuration.description: You must define the 'Personal Access Token' (with api scope) and the 'GitLab URL' you want to use. More information on how to set this is available on the GitLab documentation. Nothing is sent to any other server than the one you define here. Everything is stored locally, right in your browser.

desktop_notifications.title: Desktop Notification
desktop_notifications.description: Allows to be notified on your GitLab activity.

clean_data.title: Clean data
clean_data.description: Everything which has been stored locally in this browser will be deleted. You will have to configure everything again in this case.
